info.name: Traffic-Monitor API - Trace
info.description: Used by Traffic monitor to show the trace details

parameters.name: query
parameters.metaDescription: Defines the search definition using the Query DSL. Learn more: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/7.x/query-dsl.html

parameters.name: size
parameters.metaDescription: Defines the number of hits to return. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: index
parameters.metaDescription: Comma-separated list or wildcard expression of index names used to limit the request.

parameters.name: code
parameters.metaDescription: A JavaScript function body. Supports `await` and returning promises. `data` is the value of the Data parameter. `logger` is the API Builder logger. See the docs for more info: https://docs.axway.com/bundle/api-builder/page/docs/developer_guide/flows/flow_nodes/javascript_flow_node/index.html

parameters.name: data
parameters.metaDescription: The value to apply as the `data` argument of the JavaScript code. For objects and arrays, `data` is passed by reference.
